channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How AI Can Help Futureproof The Supply Chain
item.description: A critical mass of smaller, agile players working together can unlock network effects that rival or exceed what any one large player can offer alone.

item.title: Samsung Releases New Feature Boost To More Galaxy Phones
item.description: Samsung is rolling out more features to three new Galaxy phones.
